description: This Java class 'AnalyticsDaily' represents an entity for storing daily analytics data related to user activities such as entries, commits, pull requests, and meetings. It is mapped to the 'analytics_daily' table with a unique constraint on user_id and date.

classes.name: AnalyticsDaily
classes.description: Entity class representing daily analytics data for a user, including counters for entries, commits, pull requests, and meetings.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the analytics record.

methods.name: getDate
methods.description: Returns the date for the analytics record.

methods.name: setDate
methods.description: Sets the date for the analytics record.

methods.name: getEntriesCount
methods.description: Returns the number of entries made on the date.

methods.name: setEntriesCount
methods.description: Sets the number of entries for the date.

methods.name: getCommits
methods.description: Returns the number of commits made.

methods.name: getPrs
methods.description: Returns the number of pull requests.

methods.name: setPrs
methods.description: Sets the number of pull requests.

methods.name: getMeetings
methods.description: Returns the number of meetings attended.

methods.name: setMeetings
methods.description: Sets the number of meetings attended.
